description:
ATTENTION! This course is in English with English subtitles. I wanted to be sure, everybody understands what is going on in videos!

What we will create : CTS-Travel Homepage

You will jump to very last steps of Professional Web Design with using Foundation 4 front-end framework. So,

What is a front-end Framework?

Front-end Framework is a "total package" we can use while creating web pages.

What is Foundation 4?

Foundation 4 is made by ZURB, a product design company in California.

Foundation 4 is accepted as the most advanced responsive front-end-framework in the world by professionals.

Foundation 4 offers us nearly every element that might be used in web pages. Tons of navigation, form, button, typography and css component variations with sliders, image galleries and many more..

And most importantly! Foundation 4 is based on responsive web design technology. So your pages created with Foundation 4 are responsive!! They all look good on every device, from smartphones to desktop screens!

What will we create?

We will follow a real-life scenario in this course and a create a completed web site.

SEE IT HERE >> CTS-TRAVEL Homepage

For whom is this course?

Don't worry if you have no knowledge about web design! Basics of web technologies (html and css) are covered on first lectures!

If you have some basic html and css knowledge, this will be a big step for you to become a professional web designer.

What kind of materials are included?

This course contains only video lectures and used materials in video lectures are ready to download.

Also this course is English and with English subtitles!

Why take this course?

You will be able to create your own site as seen on this page, in just a few hours!

Foundation 4 is used by many experts in the world, and you will learn to web dessign in a professional way.

What's on next?

After 20 subscriptions I will show how to add an image gallery (DONE)

After 50 subscriptions, I will show how to add a working contact form. (DONE)

If you have questions about lectures?

I am always available to answer your questions. Also you can suggest me topics that you want to see in the course.
title: Turbo Start on Web Design with ZURB's Foundation 4 Framework
